page.title: 16Mortimer Time Capsule
page.content: 5, 6 and 7 year olds made a time capsule, collecting objects in an old chest, to be hidden at the back of the stock cupboard until Midsummer Day, year 2000, when they are sure they will return to see it opened. {Contents:- Sunday Times, Â£1 note, Milk Bottle, T.V. Times, Beatles record, Washing Powder, Heinz Baked Beans, Cowslip seeds, Union Jack, Transformer toy, Concord Model, Beano comic, Radio Times, Birthday card, Car brochure, Book of Jokes, Police car model, School newsletter, School badge, Sports certificate, Dialling code book, Postcards of 1985 stamps, Piece of lego, Aeroplane china pate dish, Safety pin, Museum leaflet, Book of fashions and dress patterns,Cereal packet, R.N.L.I. paper flag, Doll.
